dict.string: Add relative link of file to hovered text

cd /Users/nikivi/Dropbox/Write/blog
# Dash separate & lowercase file name swap=${1// /-} swap=${swap,,}
touch ${swap}.md $1 >> ${swap}.md
/usr/local/bin/subl ${swap}.md
on run argv tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" do script "Make markdown link from selection {link}" end tell end run
on run argv tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" do script "Make markdown link from selection {link}" end tell end run

Details on how to use this workflow are found in the GitHub repo attached to the workflow.
Double click this workflow in sidebar -> Open website.
